column4: hey all. I'm proud to say I've released my second music album using only LMMS and Ubuntu.
cool!
I'm going to download it now...
thanks :)
and this is the first one: http://www.4shared.com/file/121579524/8bb9dec3/MMPCV_Berer_N_Nada_2009_Creati.html?s=1
Do Canonical look for success stories ...  like  a Made with Ubuntu?
I have many success stories with Ubuntu :)
i hear that..
do you do some music?
I've had  play hydrogen and ardour - my equipment just ain't up to scratch - plus I'm not very good at it
I was planning to record against the free backing tracks that you can download from the net (guitar)
27% downloaded
i havent equipment. lol I've done all with mouse and keyboard.
LMMS is great :)
what's lmms?
and Ubuntu gives me happyness with no crashes!
yeah - i love ubuntu
Linux MultiMedia Studio: a sequencer similar to Fruity Loops Studio. http://lmms.sourceforge.net/
I'm downloading it right now...
LMMS is in development... its not a FL Studio at all... but I dont need FL Studio now :)
in leavin.
tyfon: good bye and nice days!
